Replace.Text: hopelessly illiterate

In terms of culture, I have been trying hard to break through to the second grade level of elementary school, and I like those civilizations whose cultural output per round is lower than my own. I hate civilizations with higher levels of education and more advanced technology.
Small town makes inscribed monument

Xi Zhilang's exclusive monument, replacing the monument, provides +1[ICON_Food] food, +1[ICON_Faith] faith value, +1[ICON_Science] technology value, +1[ICON_Culture] culture, +1[ICON_Production] productivity, +2[ ICON_Gold] gold coins, -1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity, the effect increases with the progress of the game era ([ICON_Amenities] amenity is a non-positive improvement).
National Theater

Xizhilang's characteristic building, which replaces the broadcast center, increases the construction cost and maintenance cost, provides an additional 1 [ICON_GreatWriter] great writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist and [ICON_GreatMusician] great musician point each round, and provides an additional 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] point ] Great Work slot and 2 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work slots). If it is adjacent to Caixi Village, it will get an additional +10 [ICON_Culture] culture and +20 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. If it is adjacent to Jiumude, it will get +20 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. At the same time, the building output in the Jiumude area will be +100%. .
Fanquan Arsenal
Jiumude level one building, alternative market, +20 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +10 [ICON_Culture] culture, +1 [ICON_Citizen] citizen slot, +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route.
Jiumude Cultural Media Center
Jiumude secondary building, alternative bank, +2 [ICON_Citizen] citizen slot, +40 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +20 [ICON_Culture] culture, +2 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route.
Jiumude Culture Development Co., Ltd.

Jiumude level three building, replacing the stock exchange, +70 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +35 [ICON_Culture] culture, [ICON_PowerInsufficient] extra +70 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +35 [ICON_Culture] culture when the power supply is sufficient. +3[ICON_Citizen] citizen slots, +3[ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes.

Jiumude

Alternative commercial center, higher production cost, the area and its buildings cannot obtain [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points, as a domestic destination, it has higher [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Gold] gold coin trade income, [ICON_Citizen] citizen income increased (+1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture). After construction is completed, you can immediately obtain 1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route. Regional buildings cannot be constructed and can only be purchased through [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
Integrity of the world

Unlocked after researching the country's labor force. Each city can only be built once and can only be built on hills. After construction, it provides +1[ICON_Culture] culture, +2[ICON_Gold] gold coin output, and +1[ICON_Housing] housing for the land. , study drama and poetry +1 [ICON_Culture] culture, study opera and ballet +2 [ICON_Culture] culture, study capitalism +4 [ICON_Gold] gold, study mass media +8 [ICON_Gold] gold, study social media Then +16 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. If it is adjacent to Caixi Village or Jiumude alone, it will get an additional +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and +2 [ICON_Amenities] habitability. If adjacent to two at the same time, additional +8 [ICON_Culture] culture, +16 [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
Caixi Village

Tribute to "Kun Kun" (note: homophonic to "Cai Xukun"), Xi Zhilang's characteristic improvement facilities with good resources and good looks, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity, +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity after research apprenticeship, research +4 [ICON_Production] productivity after industrialization, +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins after researching mass media, +8 [ICON_Gold] gold coins after researching social media.
Xi Zhilang

Xi Zhilang, you have the genes of Chu culture and Huxiang culture flowing in you. You have the simplicity and kindness of your peers, but at the same time, you have the persistence and persistence that transcend your age. You are versatile but don't show off, and you work hard but are not self-satisfied. You are the best example in the traffic field of the new era. You will use your traffic, popularity and strength to lead the desperate illiterate people to new glory!
Xi has good looks, but lacks resources
Xi has good looks, but lacks resources

"Under the premise of being reasonable and legal, acting skills are a productive force worthy of respect, appearance is also a scarce resource, and the eyeball economy is also an economy." Qian Zhihe wrote. Consume resources and provide a certain amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Culture] cultural values ​​each round. After completion, all [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes will provide an additional +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and provide a certain amount of [ICON_GreatWriter] great writer points and [ICON_GreatArtist] ] Great Artist Points.
Is it because I, Tsinghua University, am not worthy?
Is it because I, Tsinghua University, am not worthy?

"Which university does Xi Zhilang want to go to?" "I think Peking University is better." Xi Zhilang said. Each round provides a certain amount of [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] cultural value. After completion, it will provide a fixed amount of 100 [ICON_Favor] diplomatic support and a certain amount of [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist and [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist points.
The romance of "Manjianghong"
The romance of "Manjianghong"

"This is a very oriental romance. So many people... um... sacrifice their lives. What they actually want to exchange is not Qin Hui's life. In the end, he just changes to a... or a poem. This is very romantic. One thing." Xi Zhilang said. Required building: National Theater, after activation +1 [ICON_Amenities] habitability, provide a small amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Culture] cultural value, after completion, the National Theater will additionally produce +4 [ICON_Culture] cultural value, provide a small amount of [ ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points.
oh? Do you also want to take the exam?
oh? Do you also want to take the exam?

"Some people attribute their own incompetence to the excellence of others." Qian Zhihe wrote. It consumes 4000 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and 100 beauty points. After completion, a "Thousand Paper Crane" unit will be provided in the current city.
Emperor Xi ascends the throne
Emperor Xi ascends the throne

As fate would have it, the emperor issued an edict: "Emperor Xi ascends the throne!". You need to complete all Xi Zhilang related projects at least once before you can proceed. You can only complete it once. After completion, all [ICON_Gold] gold coins will be cleared, the population of all cities will be -1 [ICON_Citizen], and the output of all cities will be +100%.
Appearance
Young Colonel
paper crane

A fanatical supporter of Xi Zhi Lang, a loyal follower, and a special unit of Xi Zhi Lang. [NEWLINE] Unable to build. After establishing the [ICON_Capital] capital, you will get one of this unit in the second turn. After researching computer, radio, and remote communication technology, you can get it again in the [ICON_Capital] capital respectively. [NEWLINE]Cannot be upgraded and will return to [ICON_Capital] upon death. [NEWLINE] Its base [ICON_Strength] combat strength is always equal to the [ICON_Strength] combat strength of the strongest unit the civilization has trained. [NEWLINE]When you destroy a local military unit, you will receive gold coins equal to 100% of its combat power. [NEWLINE]Basic [ICON_Movement] movement power is 4, vision range is 3, and [ICON_Strength] combat power is not affected by status.
I hope you can become my paper crane.
In my eyes you are just a biting dog.
Did I say I was going to shoot you?
Mr. Wu, why don’t you take good care of your own sword?
I accomplished a romantic thing.
Finally, let me tell you a joke. From then on, SpongeBob and Patrick became good friends forever.
Finally, let me tell you a joke. From then on, SpongeBob and Patrick became good friends forever.
Pass the military order, all the Forbidden Army are on standby!
Pass the military order, all the Forbidden Army are on standby!
Moxi Moxi, deputy commander of the personal barracks, Sun Jun.
Moxi Moxi, deputy commander of the personal barracks, Sun Jun.
Nephew, everything is fake, only life is real
No one is allowed to see him without the Prime Minister’s permission to marry him!
(Xizhilang's favor for you has increased)
(Xizhilang's favor with you has decreased)
From today on, you are my paper crane
It's wrong to become so tough.
Give me a horse, labor and management say give me a horse!
My knife doesn't recognize anyone, I'm offended.
No such plan.
I hope you can become my paper crane.
I hope you can become my paper crane.
In my eyes you are just a biting dog.
I accomplished a romantic thing.
I'm going to read "San Wu" and then talk to you.
You go read "San Wu" and then talk to me.
A pleasure to work with.

Xizhilang is a melee unit with medieval characteristics, replacing the armored warrior. [NEWLINE][ICON_Production] productivity consumption is halved, requires special resource appearance, has higher [ICON_Movement] mobility, [ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness and maintenance fees, and [ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness is not affected by status.
